alert.note: Alert for Logan; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 6:42PM MDT until May 10 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Weld County in northeastern Colorado... Northern Logan County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 730 PM MDT. * At 642 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Proctor to near Padroni, or along a line extending from 16 miles south of Sidney to 8 miles north of Sterling, moving northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Padroni around 645 PM MDT. North Sterling Reservoir around 650 PM MDT. Peetz around 700 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Westplains. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northeastern Colorado. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
